knimeNode.name: Document Viewer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays all data of the given documents, like text, authors, publication date and so on.

fullDescription.intro: First a list of all document titles is shown. A double click on a certain title opens an additional window, showing the details of the selected document. All the information of the document are shown, which are, title, text, journal title, author names, publication date, file name, category, source and type.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the document column containing the documents to show.
